title: Rock Paper Scissors Detection
description: Recognize hand gestures (Rock, Paper or Scissors) in an image
long_description: This project allows you to train a YOLO-based model to identify rock, paper and scissors hand gestures in an image/video. This model is suitable for interactive applications, making it ideal for educational purposes, gaming, gestures controlled systems, etc.
